headline: US rig count up two as prices slide
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was unchanged this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 251 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 303 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is up two from last week at 548 rigs. A year ago, 585 rigs were active. The count shows that 414 rigs sought oil, unchanged from the previous week, and 128 explored ...
